Tanks

Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.LevelObject
      • Tanks.Projectile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Explosion

    public class Projectile
extends LevelObject
implements Explosion
    Represents the Projectiles of a level generated from Tanks.

    • Field Detail

      • tank

        public Tank tank

    • Constructor Detail

      • Projectile

        public Projectile(Level l,
                  Tank t,
                  int wind)
        Creates a projectile by associating the Level it belongs to, the Tank that fired the projectile and the Wind when shot. The projectile size is first check by verifying whether the player bought a big projectile during their turn. The initial positioning and velocity of the projectile is determined by considering the power of the tank and its turret positioning.
        Parameters:
        l - Level Object that the projectile belongs to.
        t - Tank Object that created the projectile.
        wind - Wind value at the moment the projectile was fired.

        public void explode()

        Specified by:

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Draws the projectile object on the screen at the defined position and continuously move them. Projectile is made up of a coloured circle (same as character) and a black dot. Projectile activity is checked first before drawing. Terrain is leveled as soon as explosion animation is done.
        Specified by:
        draw in class LevelObject
        Parameters:
        app - The window to draw onto
